exceptions.tactic: intros f x y Hcont Hneq.
intros f' x y Hcont Hneq.

ctx: intros f' x' y Hcont Hneq.
exceptions.exn: The reference continuity_2d_pt was not found in the current environment.

original: intros f x y Hcont Hneq. unfold continuity_2d_pt in Hcont. specialize (Hcont (mkposreal 1 (Rlt_0_1))). unfold locally_2d in Hcont. destruct Hcont as [delta Hdelta]. exists delta. intros u v Hu Hv. assert (Rabs (f u v - f x y) < 1) by (apply (Hdelta u v); assumption). apply Rabs_def2 in H. destruct H as [H1 _]. red. intro H2. subst. contradiction.
